title: Life in hot dry lands: California
brief_description: In a land devoid of rain all forms of life must struggle to survive. This film tells the story of the battle waged in the desert lands by the starving plant life, the animals, and the human beings who adapt themselves to the existence. Demonstrates where the desert area of the world are located and explains why they are barren wastelands.
